Text: Hello welcome to the bank how can i help you today!
Tell me what you know or get soaked!!

"Listen, I just work here. 
I cant give you anything "
You give me information or you get wet.

"If you work here surley you have some information? 
*the gun has been raised*"
Okay, Okay i overheard the manager telling another staff member  the server room code.
I cant exactly remember but i think its  6 2 5 9?
